text.div:
BC ExceptionValueCS CodeSystem

Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Extended set based on http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-valueabsentreason

name: ExceptionValueCS
title: BC ExceptionValueCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Extended set based on http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-valueabsentreason

concept.definition: The source human does not know the value.
concept.display: The source human does not know the value.

concept.definition: There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known.
concept.display: There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known.

concept.definition: The workflow didn't lead to this value being known.
concept.display: The workflow didn't lead to this value being known.

concept.definition: The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons.
concept.display: The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons.

concept.definition: The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element.
concept.display: The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element.

concept.definition: The content of the data is represented in the resource narrative.
concept.display: The content of the data is represented in the resource narrative.

concept.definition: Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available.
concept.display: Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available.

concept.definition: NaN, standing for not a number, is a numeric data type value representing an undefined or unrepresentable value.
concept.display: NaN, standing for not a number, is a numeric data type value representing an undefined or unrepresentable value.

concept.definition: The value is not available because the observation procedure  (test, etc.) was not performed.
concept.display: The value is not available because the observation procedure  (test, etc.) was not performed.

concept.definition: Human source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or an applicable question was left unanswered.
concept.display: Human source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or an applicable question was left unanswered.

concept.definition: The reason the information is not present is not known.
concept.display: The reason the information is not present is not known.

concept.definition: The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
concept.display: The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer

concept.definition: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen
concept.display: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

concept.definition: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
concept.display: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
